title: Fleabag
description:
This week on Spoiler Specials, Marissa Martinelli, Inkoo Kang and Heather Schwedel spoil the Amazon Prime Original series Fleabag. Is the hot priest really that hot? Should there be a season 3? Is the show deserving off all of the hype? All that and more, in spoiler filled detail.
Podcast production by Danielle Hewitt. Engineering by Cameron Drews.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
